ProjectArray.title: Personal Wikipedia
ProjectArray.about:
Website created using Html,
 CSS, Django, and Python. Create new entries or 
 edit existing entries. Data is stored as a Markdown file.

ProjectArray.title: Search - Google Clone
ProjectArray.about: This is a basic static html website. Attempting to clone Google's aesthetics and responses. You can utilize this search engine just like you would Googles'.

ProjectArray.title: Ordering System
ProjectArray.about: A back-end Python program for an ordering system API. There are ordering and checkout options with a printable receipt. Furthermore, there is admin utilization with login.
